detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract PSMToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PSMToken.sol#73-186) has payable functions:
	 - PSMToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PSMToken.sol#183-185)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
